DETEC.HE.summary: Detection Technology Oyj provides X-ray detector solutions for medical, security, and industrial applications in approximately 40 countries. The company offers X-ray line detectors, detector cards, and flat panel detectors; X-ray detector components, such as arrays and preamplifier ASICs; backside and frontside illuminated photodiode arrays; electronics; mechanics; and software products. Its X-ray detectors are used in computed tomography, digital mammography, bone densitometry, chest X-ray, and other medical applications; and X-ray imaging subsystems are used in train, vehicle, container, air cargo, and baggage and parcel scanning, as well as portable and people scanning. The company's products are also used in the agriculture, defense and aerospace, forest, mining, pharmaceutical, renewable energy, automotive, food, industrial process control, oil and gas, and recycling and waste sorting industries. Detection Technology Oyj was founded in 1991 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

VAIAS.HE.summary: Vaisala Oyj engages in the weather and environmental, and industrial measurement business serving weather related and industrial markets. The company's products include industrial measurement systems, such as HVAC and indoor air meters, industrial transmitters, power transformer monitoring systems, probes and OEM modules, handheld meters, in-line process refractometers, biogas monitoring systems, liquid measurement systems, and viewLinc continuous monitoring systems. It also provides weather and environmental solutions, such as automatic weather stations, radiosondes and sounding systems, weather and environmental sensors, weather radars, visibility and present weather sensors, ceilometers, lightning sensors, air quality sensors, road state sensors,  and wind lidars, as well as pressure, temperature, and humidity sensors. In addition, the company offers technical support, calibration and repair, system maintenance, consulting, training, project, modernization, and continuous monitoring system services, as well as online stores. Vaisala Oyj serves weather-dependent markets mainly meteorology, ground transportation, aviation, maritime, renewable energy and weather, wind energy operations and development, and urban weather and environment; and various industrial customers, including automotive, cleanrooms, HVAC and indoor air, warehouse, battery manufacturing, compressed air, life sciences and pharmaceutical, sugar and sweeteners, biogas, research facility and metrology, chemicals and allied products, power transformers, semiconductors, and others. It has operations in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North and South Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
